All Implemented Interfaces:
BlobUtils
@Singleton
public class BlobUtilsImpl
extends Object
implements BlobUtils

Encryption, Hashing, and IO Utilities needed to sign and verify blobstore requests and responses.

Author:
Adrian Cole
